page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: The one thing that makes Camber a popular place is the long sandy beach and safe bathing. It is a wonderful place for all types of sea sport, swimmimg, water skiing, sail boards, sand yachting and for walking along the seashore. The sea, the shore and the constantly changing colours enliven and invigorate visitor and villager alike. Children love to play among the sand dunes, the beach is a place where dogs may run free and enjoy life. Many people bring their horses for exercise and training when inland sites are not usable in bad weather, and even in mid_winter children will be on the beach with their parents building sand castles, playing football, cricket or rounders.
